config.text:
Personal Information

You do not have to provide your name or personal information, however, it is often helpful to an investigation if a conservation officer can follow-up on your report in order to obtain additional information. Any personal information provided will be collected, used, stored and disclosed only in accordance with the provisions of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act.

If the information you provide leads to a conviction, you may be eligible for a cash reward of up to $2,000 through the BC Wildlife Federation (BCWF) rewards program.
